The results of evaluation are understood comprehen- sively, and resolution of any identified gaps is prior- itized based on their impacts on the organization’s policies, strategy and objectives. Improvement achieved on the organization’s perfor- mance is evaluated from a long-term perspective. The organization’s performance is evaluated from the viewpoint of the needs and expectations of all interested parties. 5 Benchmarking is used systematically as a tool for identifying opportunities for improvement, learning and innovation.
